name: Starters
description: From crispy delights to savory treats, find the perfect opening act for your meal in our Starters collection.

name: Main Course
description: The main event! Dive into our signature dishes, featuring fresh ingredients and bold, satisfying flavors designed to be the star of your meal.

name: Fruit Counter
description: A refreshing pause. Cleanse your palate with our selection of juicy, fresh-cut fruits perfect for a light indulgence.

name: Mocktail Counter
description: Raise a glass! Celebrate the moment with our zesty, sweet, and tangy concoctions that keep the party going.
